front.title: Adding a Wrong Recipient URL for Handling Misdirected Emails

abstract.t: This document describes a mechanism for an email recipient to indicate to a sender that they are not the intended recipient. About This Document This note is to be removed before publishing as an RFC. The latest revision of this draft can be found at https://dweekly.github.io/ietf-wrong-recipient/draft-dweekly-wrong- recipient.html. Status information for this document may be found at https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/draft-dweekly-wrong-recipient/. Source for this draft and an issue tracker can be found at https://github.com/dweekly/ietf-wrong-recipient.
